entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
